## Two column test

\columnsbegin
\column{.5\textwidth}


```{r, eval=F, tidy=F}
library(ggplot2)
# Let's use the 
#diamonds dataset
data(diamonds)
ggplot(data=diamonds, 
   aes(x=price, 
     group=cut, 
     fill=cut)) + 
geom_density(adjust=1.5, 
     alpha=0.2)
```

\column{.65\textwidth}

```{r, echo=F, out.width = '0.9\\linewidth'}

# ggplot2 library
library(ggplot2)
# Let's use the diamonds dataset
data(diamonds)
#head(diamonds)

# plot 2: Density plot with transparency (using the alpha argument):
ggplot(data=diamonds,aes(x=price, group=cut, fill=cut)) + 
    geom_density(adjust=1.5 , alpha=0.2)
```

\columnsend
